sentence.Network_en: The human emulating this archetypal patterning will be quite the accomplished businessperson.

sentence.Network_en: As a small businessperson you have no greater leverage than the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个小商人,诚实是最大的优势.

sentence.Network_en: How businessperson requests a meeting depends on their position in the organization.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 商人（英语：businessperson）是商界适用最广泛的名词；实业家的定义则趋近于「大型事业经营者」，只要合乎使所拥有的事业有 …
...师，所有的自由党主席(President)都出身于生意人(Businessperson)。
传统的会计学程也许能教出很好的会计人员，但并不具备成为优秀商业人士(businessperson)的条件。因此改变现在的课程架构是必须 …

My father was a small businessperson ., 我父亲是一个小企业主.

I want to invest the money in your country as soon as I am redeploy into your country for a good business , anyway you will advice me on that since I am not a businessperson .我想在贵国投资的钱，只要我到贵国时有一个良好的业务调配，反正我对你的意见是因为我不是一个商人。
A wealthy and powerful businessperson or industrialist ; a magnate ., 巨头富有的 , 强有力的商人或工业家 ; 大亨.
businesspersons may use the term " promotion " when actually mean " sales promotion . "商务人员在说“推销”时，实际上指的是“促销”。

Sentence.sentence: His fall from grace in the 1980s, followed by his return to Apple in 1996 after a period in the wilderness, is an inspiration to any businessperson whose career has taken a turn for the worse.
